headline: Lowered Guidance and Sector Headwinds Might Change the Case for Investing in Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE)
summary: Earlier this month, Alexandria Real Estate Equities reported third-quarter 2025 earnings that missed expectations, reduced its 2025 guidance, and shared an initial 2026 outlook that was below consensus estimates amid weak demand and elevated vacancies in the life science real estate sector. This setback has occurred as the company faces supply pressures, cautious tenant sentiment, and regulatory uncertainty, leading analysts to lower their outlook and downgrade their ratings. We’ll examine...
